item.title: Remembering Nob Hill Casino Las Vegas: A Strip History of Low Limits and Accessible Fun
item.description:
A Different Kind of Strip Experience: Introducing Nob Hill Casino

The Las Vegas Strip has always been about spectacle and excess, but tucked between the giants like the Sands and the Holiday Casino, a different kind of experience thrived: Nob Hill Casino. Opening its doors in the summer of 1978, Nob Hill wasnâ€™t aiming for high rollers or themed extravagance. Instead, it catered to budget-minded players and those seeking a more relaxed, accessible nightlife scene.
